name: Notion Real Estate Template
description: Stop wasting time juggling tools.Start investing like a pro, in Notion.The Real Estate Hub Notion Template is an all-encompassing and powerful tool that has been meticulously crafted to assist real estate professionals in effectively managing their daily tasks, properties & finances. This innovative template features 15+ distinct databases & templates, each of which is expertly tailored to address a specific aspect of the real estate industry, providing you with the confidence you need t
features: Contacts: This is basically your CRM for tenants, contractors, utilities, and others. Each contact can be associated with one or multiple properties.
